text:
If you try to use appletviewer, the Category class will throw a
SecurityException. (I used JDK 1.3).

MyApplet.java:
==========================
import java.applet.Applet;

import org.apache.log4j.BasicConfigurator;
import org.apache.log4j.Category;

public class MyApplet extends Applet {

    private static Category cat = Category.getInstance(MyApplet.class.getName
());

    public void init() {
        super.init();
        BasicConfigurator.configure();
        cat.info("Hello, World!");
    }

}
==========================

index.html:
==========================
<html>
<head>
<title>MyApplet</title>
</head>
<body>
<applet code="MyApplet.class" width="100" height="100">
</applet>
</body>
</html>
==========================

build.xml:
==========================
<project name="MyApplet" default="run" basedir=".">

    <target name="compile">
        <javac srcdir="."/>
    </target>

    <target name="run" depends="compile">
    	<exec executable="appletviewer">
    	    <arg value="index.html"/>
    	</exec>
    </target>

</project>
==========================
